title: Resolve establishing a special commission to review advancements in educational technology, digital/online learning and related programs

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Walsh of Peabody, a petition (accompanied by resolve, House, No. 107) of Thomas P. Walsh for an investigation by a special commission relative to advancements in educational technology, digital and online learning, and related programs.  Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

related_entities.name: committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/10/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
